page.title: 06Playground Games
page.content:
Here are three of the games we play at our school at playtimes. {Granny's Footsteps:}someone is "on it" and that person stands not facing the other people.When the person that is "on it" faces the wall you take as many steps as you can until the person turns around.If he sees you still running YOU are "on it".
{Chain chase:}somebody is "on it" and when he or she catches a person he has to hold hands with him or her. When you get up to four, you split into two pairs and so on.
{What's the time Mr.Wolf:}somebody faces the wall,the others walk slowly up to him and say,"What's the time Mr.Wolf?" He says a time. If he says 'Dinner time' you run back to the start.
